name: Don't Touch Me!
description:
Our beautiful princess was caught. The whole world is now filled with witch’s screaming. How could our princess save herself?
Well, take off your high-heeled shoes and smash the witch over her face.

DON’T TOUCH ME!

Flick your finger on the screen, throw the crystal shoes and hit the witch. The princess will be protected and reward by crystals. But, look out the prince on white horse. He comes to save our princess, don’t hurt him or our princess will cry.

Feature
★ Only needs lightly slide, very easy to play.
Regardless of gender, age, job, everyone cab play this game. To kill time or for entertainment, all you need is to lightly slide on the screen.
★Graceful pictures filled with magic and mystery.
There are three sense currently called Castle, Beach and Plain. You can feel the romantic love between princess and prince in fantastic painting style.
★Gorgeous Heels
You can use three different heels now: Red Rose, Violet and White Queen. They have different color and power.
★ Mysterious Prince
You will never know when your prince will come for you. Maybe when he is coming on a white horse, your shoes is flying to him.
★Endless witches with unknown magic
Your enemy may have magic power. Some will help you, but some will make you hurry-scurry.
★ More sense and mode will come soon.
